useCase.name: Sponsor Selects and Pays for Summit Sponsorship
useCase.trigger: Sponsor selects a summit to sponsor

mainSequence.step: Summit Management System fetches summits matching brand criteria
Summit Coordination System provides summit details
Summit Management System lists available summits
Sponsor selects a summit to sponsor
Summit Management System displays sponsorship levels and benefits
Summit Management System provides sponsorship details and payment information form
Payment System notifies Summit Management System of payment success
Summit Management System assigns Sponsor to Summit
Summit Management System provides Sponsorship confirmation and receipt
